description: Retrieves a list of your historical recommendation generations within the past 30 days.

parameters.name: RecommendationIds
parameters.description: The IDs for each specific recommendation. (string) ---

nested_items.name: GenerationSummaryList
nested_items.description: The list of historical recommendation generations.

nested_items.name: RecommendationId
nested_items.description: Indicates the ID for this specific recommendation.

nested_items.name: GenerationStatus
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the recommendation generation succeeded, is processing, or failed.

nested_items.name: GenerationStartedTime
nested_items.description: Indicates the start time of the recommendation generation.

nested_items.name: GenerationCompletionTime
nested_items.description: Indicates the completion time of the recommendation generation.

nested_items.name: EstimatedCompletionTime
nested_items.description: Indicates the estimated time for when the recommendation generation will complete.

nested_items.name: NextPageToken
nested_items.description: The token to retrieve the next set of results.
